item.title: How Computers Work: From Sand to Microsoft Word
item.description: An approachable explanation of how computers are built, from basic materials to modern applications.

item.title: About

I’m a 4th-year electrical engineering student at Polytechnique MontrÃ©al. I’m deeply passionate about technology, with a strong love for math and computer science. Lately, I’ve been focusing on hardware acceleration for AI, but I enjoy exploring nearly every field within electrical engineering.
